content.content:
â—‹ br-b01 Â· Preserve projects/*/memory/ dirs â€” auto-memory files must survive the reset   [â— P1 Â· OPEN]
Owner: skogix Â· Type: task
Created: 2026-02-20 Â· Updated: 2026-02-20
---
â—‹ br-ch2 Â· go over the workflow we would need for git add -A at the start of the users turn. he do the changes and a git diff vs git diff --cached is the changes + intent in message itself   [â— P2 Â· OPEN]
Owner: skogix Â· Type: task
Created: 2026-02-20 Â· Updated: 2026-02-20
---
â—‹ br-2d2 Â· sync beads DB on worktree creation via worktrunk hook   [â— P2 Â· OPEN]
Owner: skogix Â· Type: feature
Created: 2026-02-20 Â· Updated: 2026-02-20

Beads sqlite DB is per-worktree and starts empty. When a new worktree is created, br sync --import-only should run automatically to hydrate the DB from the shared JSONL.

Implementation path:
- worktrunk manages worktrees, config at $HOME/.config/worktrunk/config.toml
- easiest entry point: wt hook <name> to register a post-create hook
- hook should run: br sync --import-only in the new worktree directory
- also consider: br sync --flush-only as a pre-remove hook to not lose in-flight issues
